Articles.Content:
Hi! This is still a concept but im happy with the results, so i wanna share this craft with you.

This is a roadster hybrid car, electricity and jet powered engine, the electric motor is safer, but if u switch to jet mode u will be able to reach 200km/h (55m/s), but probably u will crash or destroy the front of the car due to the low profile.

Painted in Lime green:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Let me know what do u think about it, and if u liike it i could share with you!
haha It looks cool with basic jet engine. It reminds me Batmobile ;d
